title: Calories in a Cosmic Brownie
meta_description: Discover calories in a cosmic brownie, including carbs, fat, protein, full nutrition breakdown, and simple tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard Little Debbie Cosmic Brownie (50 g), chocolate base with fudge icing and colorful candy pieces; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, batch, size, and storage; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A cosmic brownie packs ~250 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cosmic brownie?
faqs.a: Approximately 250 kcal for one standard cosmic brownie.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a cosmic brownie?
faqs.a: About 35 g total carbs, including 25 g sugars and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a cosmic brownie high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 12 g total fat per brownie, with 6 g saturated.

faqs.q: How much protein in a cosmic brownie?
faqs.a: Roughly 2 g protein, making it low in this nutrient.
No, they contain wheat flour; check labels for allergens.
